name: The Great Machine
description:
The theme was: The Great Machine. I sort of went for a rhetoric on mental health, with society being 'The Great Machine'.

If your demons destroy you, you lose.

If you use your health to destroy your demons, you win.

If you outrun your demons, you win.

Good luck.

https://github.com/benkyd/OLCCodeJam2020-The-Great-Machine
